page.title: 04Playground Games
page.content: In our school playground we play all kinds of games:- French Elastic,Hop-scotch, skipping, football, tennis, hide-and-seek, Foxy, and Old Mr. Crocodile {Hop-scotch You need a piece of chalk, an area of pavement, a big, smooth, heavy stone. You draw four squares, then draw a square to the right and to the left of the fourth square, and two more above it. Number the squares 1 to 8. First you throw the stone into square one, then hop over that square to number two and jump with legs apart onto four and five, hop onto square six, jump onto seven and eight, turn and hop and jump back to square two, pick up the stone hop over one, and begin again this time throwing at two. Written by Michela Russo.
